data.name: Death's Playground
data.detailed_description:
Enjoy scaring your friends or other players so much they might get a heart attack or try to survive from the horrors of the haunted locations, in this Asymmetrical Multiplayer Psychological Horror Game!

The main focus in Death's Playground is to turn the single-player horror game experience into a multiplayer game where you can keep getting scared as if you are playing it for the first time. The killer in this game cannot hurt you in any direct way possible, but it has all the means necessary to scare you to death, making your life miserable and making it really hard for you to stay calm.



GAMEPLAY:

Survivors:
Work as a team of 4 Survivors breaking into abandoned places and search and escape with proof of the hauntings. Search, complete objectives, roam around in the dark with your lighter or find a flashlight or a lantern to help you out, but be on lookout! There is a killer roaming around the place trying to scare you to death. You can also find weapons that can slow the killer down and buy you some time, but you can never entirely get rid of the enemy.
"He doesn't stab, he plays with you, trying to make you mad first!"

Earn experience points to level up your characters and shape them into your playstyle, being it stealthy, objective-focused, direct contact or running away from the killer.


Killer:
As a Killer, you have to protect your lair!
With a full set of abilities to help you control the map, be omnipresent and stay stealthy in order to scare survivors when they are expecting it the least. As a very powerful character in this game you have all the means necessary to control, chase, scare survivors and eventually KILL THEM, before they run away with proof of your existence.

Earn experience points to level up your killers and shape them into your playstyle, being it stealthy, map controlling, enduring or ending chases faster to scare and kill survivors more easily.



CAUTION!
This game contains content that is not advised to sensible people, under aged people (17-) or people with the following problems:
- heart diseases;
- mental insecurities;
- epilepsy.

data.short_description: Enjoy scaring your friends or other players so much they might get a heart attack or try to survive from the horrors of the haunted locations in this Asymmetrical Multiplayer Psychological Horror Game! Death's Playground brings the single-player horror games experience into the multiplayer world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit Operating System
  • Processor: Core Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GForce 720M
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit Operating System
  • Processor: Core Intel i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GForce 1060GTX
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
Mature content disclaimer!
Includes Violence and Gore, not suited for people with psychological or heart problems.
Psychological horror with jumpscares, chases and stressful environment full of blood, guts and dead people.
